data.title: The Murder of Elisa Izquierdo
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Black Girls Talk Crime on Spotify. Elisa Izquierdo was considered the Cinderella of New York City in 1995. She was born to a crack addicted mother but was given to her father who loved and adored her. She spent the first 5 years of her life with her proud father until tragedy struck and she was handed back to her mother. A year later Elisa would be dead. What happened to this beautiful angel and what monster ended her life before it could truly begin?
